action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a large, historic building with a green dome on top. The building has classical architectural features, including columns and statues. There is a modern, multi-story building in the background. In front of the historic building, there are several cars and a double-decker bus on the street. Trees are visible on the left side of the image.

The catcher, in a black uniform with red accents, is positioned behind the batter, reaching out to catch the ball. An umpire is crouched behind the catcher. The background includes a green field, a dugout, and a crowd of spectators.
